message.content:
{"id": "6536", 
"title": "Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing", 
"description": "", 
"OB": "When selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu of the field in TH, nothing happens. This menu should either be removed or preferably the action should add the Javadoc for the field.", 
"EB": "After selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu of the field in TH, nothing happens. The expected behavior is that the action should add the Javadoc for the field.", 
"SR": "Update the 'Add Javadoc' action in the context menu for the field in TH to properly add the Javadoc for the field."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
